author: Kieran Lewis
comment: Customising the watch face on my Urbane is a complete pain! The changes hardly ever take affect and takes ages to edit again. A companion app where you could store presets would be a better option...

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Hi Kieran, 
There should be a companion app in the Android wear app. If you have the watch selected as your current watchface,  there should be a gear you can press that will launch the companion app. If you can't find it please email us at scoondesign@gmail.com for more support. Thanks!

title: Needs companion app!

author: Luis Gabriel Gerena
comment: Can you add the option to change the dim colors? Also instead of preset color why not a full range color wheel thingy?

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Luis the dim mode face can be disabled in the last option at the bottom of the settings. This will give you the same colors you see in the non-dim mode face.
As far as a color wheel, that is a recent development we will continue to include in our newer watches. We may update our older watches as time permits.
Thanks for your continued support.
